alert.note: Alert for Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 03 at 4:26PM EST until March 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EST FOR CENTRAL LEWIS...SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES... At 426 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Rome to Head of Grassy, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Vanceburg, Head of Grassy, Camp Dix, Rome, Blue Creek, Concord, Sandy Springs, Saint Paul, Firebrick, Carrs, Harris, Kinniconick, Tannery, Emerson, Turkey Creek Lake, Friendship, Charters, Garrison and Stricklett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for northeastern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
